definitions.definition: The act of redressing; a making right ; amendment ; correction ; reformation .
A setting right, as of injury , oppression , or wrong , such as the redress of grievances ; hence , indemnification ; relief ; remedy ; reparation .
A possibility to set right , or a possibility to seek a remedy , for instance in court
One who, or that which, gives relief; a redresser .

main_definition: The act of redressing; a making right ; amendment ; correction ; reformation .
secondary_definitions: A setting right, as of injury , oppression , or wrong , such as the redress of grievances ; hence , indemnification ; relief ; remedy ; reparation .
A possibility to set right , or a possibility to seek a remedy , for instance in court
One who, or that which, gives relief; a redresser .

definitions.definition: The redecoration of a previously existing film set so that it can double for another set.

main_definition: ( film ) The redecoration of a previously existing film set so that it can double for another set.
